caption.p: Lead-free film perovskite-based LEDs. ( a) Cross-sectional SEM image of device; ( b) normalized electroluminescence (EL) spectrum of the Cs 3Sb 2I 9 film. Reproduced with permission [ 73]. Copyright American Chemical Society, 2019. ( c) Activation energy and photoluminescence quantum yields (PLQY) of Cs 2Ag xNa 1−xInCl 6 powder vs. Na content. The dashed lines are guides for the eye. ( d) Cs 2Ag 1−xNa xInCl 6 Luminosity function (dashed line) and photoluminescence spectra (solid lines) of Cs 2Ag 0.60Na 0.40InCl 6 measured at different temperatures from 233 K to 343 K. Reproduced with permission [ 74]. Copyright Springer Nature Limited, 2018.
